name: fangmin
short_description: Under the nose of us, in the capital, there are some people who do not have homes or can not go back home living the hardest life in Beijing. Taking Beijing South Railway Station as the center, they scatter around it. They eat vegetable leaves thrown by other people, drink tap water, and sleep in the openings or beside the river. Those homeless petitioners and vagrants are the main aid recipients of our organization. Since 2009, Citizens Assistance has been popular among those people.
